Source: Help dataset from EMNLP 2020 paper: Help! Need Advice on Identifying Advice
Definition: Identify the given sentence as general advice or not. If it is a general advice then indicate via "yes", else indicate via "no". Advise comes in different forms viz. Direct advice (Using simple sentences or questions) and Indirect advice (contains hints from personal experiences with the intention for someone to do the same thing or statements that imply an action should or should not be taken).
